metadata.businessValue: Enables a Customer’s Meetings Production Team to deliver and support Teams Live Events. Provides a repeatable process for delivering Live Events, preparing presenters for the experience, and providing troubleshooting and support during events.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content: Cyclotron Training and Support for Teams Live Events. Learn how to Produce, Deliver and Support Teams Live Events.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
Are you looking to host Teams Live Events for your Corporate Enterprise? Do you need to support a Virtual Conference?

Cyclotron has a focused program to train and support your Production Team to deliver Teams Live Events.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
Cyclotron has a three session Training Program focused preparing your team to run Teams Live Events:

*  Planning andTraining
*  Hands on Experience
*  Real Time Support

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: Cyclotron has supported multiple multi-national corporations and professional organizations to deliver Teams Live Events. Once trained, these organizations have been able to support the ongoing delivery of Events with ease.

detailItemCategories.name: Resources
detailItemCategories.description: Possible html supported text shown just above the list of links
